thread.title: BRIEF-Westwater Resources Announces Optimized Business Plan For Graphite Battery Materials Opportunity

title: BRIEF-Westwater Resources Announces Optimized Business Plan For Graphite Battery Materials Opportunity
text: March 1, 2018 / 1:27 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Westwater Resources Announces Optimized Business Plan For Graphite Battery Materials Opportunity Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 1 (Reuters) - Westwater Resources Inc: * WESTWATER RESOURCES ANNOUNCES OPTIMIZED BUSINESS PLAN FOR GRAPHITE BATTERY MATERIALS OPPORTUNITY AND APPOINTS VICE PRESIDENT OF MARKETING * WESTWATER RESOURCES INC - ‍WWR IS IN PROCESS OF ACQUIRING ALABAMA GRAPHITE CORP​ * WESTWATER RESOURCES INC - ‍TRANSACTION EXPECTED TO CLOSE DURING Q2 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
